hint.text: Polynomials in two variable have \(2\,\) different variables.

solution.text:
\(_{j}_x - _{j}_y\,\) has two variables \(x\,\) and \(y.\)
\(p^a + q^b\,\) also has two variables \(p\,\) and \(q.\)
\(x^{_{j}_} + y^{_{k}_} +z + _{l}_\,\) and \(t+_{k}_\,\) have three and one variables respectively.
